Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

Personal: Son of Bill and Wendy Ross … Working towards MBA after already earning undergraduate degree from SRU … Father Bill is a 1984 Slippery Rock graduate.

2024: Appeared in 34 games while making 22 starts as The Rock’s designated hitter … Posted a .358 on-base percentage while batting .244 with 11 runs scored, one home run, 17 RBI and a .321 slugging percentage … Hit .294 (10-34) with runners in scoring position … Ranked fifth on The Rock in walks (12) … Went 2-for-3 with two runs and three RBI in SRU’s 15-9 win against California … Brought home the game-winning run on a walk-off sacrifice fly to beat IUP 3-2 on April 7 … Closed career with a two-hit, four-RBI performance in PSAC Tournament loss to East Stroudsburg … Game-by-Game Statistics

2023: Started 40 of 41 games played while splitting time between catcher and designated hitter … Hit .296 with 27 runs, two home runs and 16 RBI … Slugged .408 with a .375 on-base percentage … Registered nine multi-hit games … Season-long hitting streak was 11 games … Ranked third for The Rock in batting average … Went 5-for-6 with four runs and two doubles vs. Alliance … Hit home runs at IUP and Pitt-Johnstown … Game-by-Game Statistics

2022: Started three of eight games played as The Rock’s backup catcher … Hit .214 with 3three runs and three RBI … Recorded first career hit and RBI against Davis & Elkins on March 5 … Drove in two runs against Lock Haven … Game-by-Game Statistics

2021: Appeared in two games as a reserve catcher … Earned playing time March 20 vs. Clarion and April 27 at No. 7 Seton Hill … Game-by-Game Statistics

2020: Did not appear in a game.

High School: Lettered four times in baseball and once in wrestling at Cochranton High School … A two-time All-PIAA Region 3 honoree ... Named the Cochranton Team MVP as a senior.

Top Performances Date Opponent Stats 3/4/23 Alliance 5-6, 4 Runs, 1 RBI 3/5/23 Alliance 2-3, 4 Runs, 3 RBI 4/14/24 California 2-3, 2 Runs, 3 RBI 5/8/24 East Stroudsburg 2-5, 4 RBI, 1 Run
